PerspectiveCamera Class

Defined in: src/davinci-eight/facets/PerspectiveCamera.ts:51
Module: facets
Parent Module: EIGHT

Constructor

PerspectiveCamera

(
  • [fov = 45 * Math.PI / 180]
  • [aspect=1]
  • [near=0.1]
  • [far=2000]
)

Defined in src/davinci-eight/facets/PerspectiveCamera.ts:51

Parameters:

  • [fov = 45 * Math.PI / 180] Number optional
  • [aspect=1] Number optional
  • [near=0.1] Number optional
  • [far=2000] Number optional

Example:

var camera = new EIGHT.PerspectiveCamera() camera.setAspect(canvas.clientWidth / canvas.clientHeight) camera.setFov(3.0 * e3)

Properties

aspect

Number

Defined in src/davinci-eight/facets/PerspectiveCamera.ts:133

The aspect ratio (width / height) of the camera viewport.

eye

Vector3

Defined in src/davinci-eight/facets/PerspectiveCamera.ts:154

The position of the camera.

fov

Number

Defined in src/davinci-eight/facets/PerspectiveCamera.ts:191

The field of view is the (planar) angle (magnitude) in the camera horizontal plane that encloses object that can be seen. Measured in radians.

inner

Perspective private

Defined in src/davinci-eight/facets/PerspectiveCamera.ts:44

Number

Defined in src/davinci-eight/facets/PerspectiveCamera.ts:225

The distance to the near plane.

Defined in src/davinci-eight/facets/PerspectiveCamera.ts:167

The position of the camera.

PROP_POSITION

String static

Defined in src/davinci-eight/facets/PerspectiveCamera.ts:26

The name of the property that designates the position.

Default: 'X'
